hero.title: Kenya Trip Packages & Reviews
hero.subtitle: Browse 2.3M+ verified experiences from real travelers and local experts

trips.title: Ultimate Maasai Mara Safari Experience
trips.description: Experience the Great Migration and Big Five with expert Maasai guides. Includes luxury tented camps, game drives, and cultural visits.
trips.aiRecommendation: Perfect for first-time Kenya visitors. Best wildlife viewing from July-October.

trips.title: Coastal Paradise: Diani Beach & Culture
trips.description: Relax on pristine beaches, explore Swahili culture in Stone Town, and enjoy water sports. Perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.
trips.aiRecommendation: Ideal for beach lovers. Visit during dry season (Dec-Mar, Jul-Oct) for best weather.

trips.title: Mount Kenya Climbing & Wildlife Safari
trips.description: Conquer Africa's second-highest peak, then unwind with a wildlife safari in Samburu. An epic adventure for thrill-seekers.
trips.aiRecommendation: Best for experienced hikers. Clear weather conditions optimal from Jan-Feb, Jun-Sep.

trips.title: Cultural Heritage & Local Communities
trips.description: Immerse yourself in Kenya's rich cultural tapestry. Visit traditional villages, markets, and participate in local ceremonies.
trips.aiRecommendation: Perfect for cultural enthusiasts. Experience authentic Kenyan traditions year-round.

trips.title: Family-Friendly Nakuru & Lake Naivasha
trips.description: Perfect introduction to Kenyan wildlife for families. See rhinos, flamingos, and enjoy boat rides on Lake Naivasha.
trips.aiRecommendation: Great for families with kids 8+. Shorter game drives and child-friendly accommodations.

trips.title: Luxury Safari: Amboseli & Tsavo
trips.description: Experience Kenya in ultimate luxury with private guides, premium lodges, and exclusive access to pristine wilderness areas.
trips.aiRecommendation: Premium experience with private guides. Best during dry season for optimal game viewing.

trips.title: Serene Beach Getaway
trips.description: Relax on beautiful sandy beaches and enjoy the coastal breeze. Perfect for unwinding and rejuvenation.
trips.aiRecommendation: Perfect for relaxation seekers. Best enjoyed during calm weather seasons.

trips.title: City Hotel Experience
trips.description: Enjoy a comfortable stay in a modern city hotel with all amenities. Perfect for business or leisure travelers.
trips.aiRecommendation: Ideal for business travelers or city explorers. Central location with easy access to attractions.

trips.title: Exclusive Boutique Hotel
trips.description: Stay in a unique boutique hotel with personalized service and distinctive design. Luxury and charm combined.
trips.aiRecommendation: Perfect for couples seeking luxury and charm. Best to book in advance for peak seasons.

trips.title: Beachfront Paradise Resort
trips.description: Wake up to ocean views and pristine beaches at this exclusive beachfront resort. Paradise on earth.
trips.aiRecommendation: Ideal for water sports enthusiasts. Perfect waves and clear water conditions year-round.

trips.title: Nairobi Heritage Railway
trips.description: Experience Kenya's colonial history on a vintage railway journey through scenic landscapes. A unique historical adventure.
trips.aiRecommendation: A unique way to see Kenya's countryside. Best experience during clear weather months.
